summary: ICP dapp scaffold with Motoko backend canister and Vite/React/Tailwind frontend, including a marketing-style landing page (with Demo & Media section removed), Internet Identity authentication hooks, and a contact submission flow.
architectural_notes: Frontend uses generated Candid bindings and an actor creation hook to call the Motoko backend.
Authentication is designed around Internet Identity; unauthenticated vs authenticated actor usage is encapsulated in hooks/utilities.
UI layer is built with Tailwind and bundled shadcn/ui components for consistent design system primitives.

Landing page content is organized as discrete section components, allowing additional documentation-style sections (e.g., manual/code/diagrams) to be added without restructuring the overall app shell.
known_issues: Deployment/build process is currently failing with an unspecified deployment error (snag during deployment).
